name: BANANIHILATION
description:
Made for Mini Jam 54.

I learnt a lot, but also made a lot of mistakes along the way. Ended up focusing too much on certain aspects while ignoring others (rip sound & control info).

I'll probably refine it enough to be more passable eventually. For now, enjoy!

(Added)

- Basic Sound, Menu screen with controls

(Known Bugs)

Sound doesn't start again when you restart the game. It was my first time working with Audio, and I couldn't be bothered to figure it out after so many hours spent oof.
